verses.verse: ( The Fifth Trumpet) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then ὁ <WG3588> ho the πέμπτος <WG3991> pemptos fifth ἄγγελος <WG32> angelos angel ἐσάλπισεν <WG4537> esalpisen sounded [his] trumpet , καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I saw ἀστέρα <WG792> astera a star ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven πεπτωκότα <WG4098> peptōkota that had fallen εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὴν <WG3588> tēn - γῆν <WG1093> gēn earth , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐδόθη <WG1325> edothē it was given αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - ἡ <WG3588> hē the κλεὶς <WG2807> kleis key τοῦ <WG3588> tou to the φρέατος <WG5421> phreatos pit τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the ἀβύσσου <WG12> abyssou Abyss .
